direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add items to the deferredValues list, with addAll adding multiple items at once.
Both methods add multiple items to the deferredValues list, but one takes a List and the other a Stream.
Both methods handle DeferredChanged objects, with addAll handling multiple objects.
